com.jinkchak

Class MainGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jinkchak.MainGUI

  • public class MainGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class constructs the GUI of our application, using the classes provided by the SWT.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainGUI(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display)
      This constructor initializes the GUI variables and event loop, and creates a new shell for the Display object passed to it as a parameter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initUI()
      This method initializes the form layout of the GUI, and initializes the values and location of each widget in the GUI.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method, that creates a display object and creates a MainGUI object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainGUI

        public MainGUI(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display)
        This constructor initializes the GUI variables and event loop, and creates a new shell for the Display object passed to it as a parameter. It also initializes an object of the Schmidt_Samoa_Encryptor class.
        Parameters:
        display - A Display object

    • Method Detail

      • initUI

        public void initUI()
        This method initializes the form layout of the GUI, and initializes the values and location of each widget in the GUI.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method, that creates a display object and creates a MainGUI object.
